author: Maurizio Fiorino, Kate Lowenstein
title: I've Been Quarantined in Rome for 15 Days. Here's What Americans Can Expect
description: Today I had lunch at 6pm, then I went out shopping. It’s almost midnight. Usually at this time I get ready to go to sleep. Now I’m drunk.
content: Americans, my brothers and sisters. I am writing to you from a room during my coronavirus quarantine. That sounds absurd, doesnt it? But we are at war. Like our grandparents. They were asked to go to the front, we have to fight from the sofa at home. So put o… [+4982 chars]
